name: Doug Sanders
text: Food was great. Service was a little slow at times considering it wasn't crowded. Waitress was friendly and training someone, may have slowed her down. I would go back.

name: Rachel Maynard
text: FINALLY, this what i have been waiting for !!! By far the best pizza i have ever had. The meatballs are AMAZING. I stopped in this weekend and was blown away by the outstanding customer service, fast and efficient wait time, and eclectic ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith W
text: Great place to go for a new fresh tasting spin on pizza. Several new pizzarias are using wood fired ovens. However, this establshment uses a coal fired oven giving the pizza and other foods on the menu a unique flavor. Also, everything is freshly which makes the food delicious! I had the Philly Cheese Steak pizza, which was very good.

name: Matthew Davoren
text: WOW! Just WOW!  :) I can't say enough about their pizza but in particular this location in Lombard. What a place. What a place indeed. Our server, Jack couldn't have been any more pleasant. Such a gentleman. Very attentive but not ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Suger
text: I like their pizza, but I think their wings are what sets them apart.  Their wings are coal fire baked and topped with caramelized onions.  Yum.  Last time I had a trainy server so its too early to tell about service.

name: Jennifer Pee
text: Came here a couple of nights ago for our first time and had a great time. Has a welcoming, family vibe which i liked. The young man behind the bar was very knowledgeable on the menu and the specialty drinks. Will definitely be back!

name: Jack Rylands
text: This restaurant has great service, nice staff and guess what? The food is ABSOLUTELY TO DIE FOR! The pizza is made fresh in a coal fired oven and so is everything else. The designs on the inside are really cool too. I would definitely come back many more times. 13/10.

name: Faizeen Khandaker
text: The pizza and service are both exceptional, as long as you like the slightly burnt taste. If you don't like that much char, ask them to keep the char on the light side. The pizza tastes similar to pies we had at high end places in Italy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tammie Haymer
text: The pizza was tasteless. My pizza did not have enough sauce and I express this the server. He pretty much said oh well sorry to hear that. The manager walked to everyone table and bypass me and my daughter. He rarely returned to my table ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Jacobson
text: The restaurant is comfortable, and extremely clean. We were greeted and shown to a table immediately. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bri Halfpenny
text: The only pizza I eat. Ordered take-out on a whim as I live nearby and pass this location frequently. I don't eat a lot of bread/pasta and most pizza crust is too doughy to me. I love how this is the perfect thin, slightly chewy, crunchy on the edges pizza.  The Mediterranean pizza is absolutely delicious!!!!

name: sadia rimsha
text: Ambience was great, service was prompt, food was good but one waitress was really rude. She didn't like explaining some things to us and her attitude was derogatory. Good place to eat coal fired pizzas. Great for moms night out. They need to add some more topping options for pizzas.

name: Emily Lombardo
text: We went here for a late lunch around 3:30/4 PM and we were the only people in the restaurant. Ordered 3 pizzas and it not only took almost an hour to get our food but 2 came out burnt and one came out wrong! Wasn't offered a new pizza for ‚Ä¶More

name: Rashad Singletary
text: Tried this place out for the first time with the wife and kid and it did not disappoint. Went tried the Philly Cheesesteak pizza, the wings and stuffed shells and I would order all of them again. Looking forward to trying other thing on the menu. Everyone was super friendly and it had a nice atmosphere.

name: Andrea Kennya
text: Pizza was great, it was nice and toasty & thin sliced just how I like it. I'm not a cheese freak and so I felt like the pizza had just the right amount. Only complaint is that they don't carry any ranch dressing for the wings! The wings ‚Ä¶More

name: Jasean Lawrence
text: I came in here today after getting my Starbucks just next door. I only saw a couple of tables eating. I didn't even know it had a bar until I walked in the door. I thought this was more of a place like sbarro's or Jet's where I could just ‚Ä¶More

name: Yesenia Benavides
text: Delicious pizza and drinks

name: Ken Baumgardner
text: Great pizza with super fresh ingredients.  Great service. Unique coal fired oven.  Nice atmosphere.  Plenty of tables an two large booths.

name: Chris Parker
text: Comfortable, casual modern decor.  Good selection of beer.  Everything it's cooked in the coal fired oven, even the wings, which are great!  Of course, you have to try the pizza, made fresh and absolutely delicious!

name: O G
text: Very impressed with the delicious menu items at a reasonable price. A great spot for lunch.

name: Zachary Belzer
text: The meatballs and pizza were good. We had kids, so we couldn't keep the pizza at the small table, but the place was fairly empty so it didn't matter.

name: Matthew Pike
text: The wings and pizza are both very good. It is a nice atmosphere and I will definitely go back again. We shared a small Via Divola and cheese pizza. I would recommend them both and I look forward to going back and bringing the family.

name: Carol Williams-Deacon
text: Not sure what has happened since the grand opening but the overall quality has declined and the pizza prices have soared. During this visit, my order consisted of the Italian Lunch Salad w/Tuna and the Italian Tuna Salad Sandwich. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ariela Saltijeral
text: Great pizza. The staff was very friendly. Will definitely be back soon!

name: Kathy Horning
text: Great and informative service from Stephanie. The crust on the pizza is the right balance of crisp and chew. The ingredients are fresh and well seasoned. The Italian chicken wings are also very tasty

name: Christopher Talbot
text: Pizza was great!  Service was poor, they cared more about their takeout than customers in the restaurant.  Grossly understaffed.  I'm going to try another time to see if this was a fluke

name: Phil Blaze
text: Great wings & the meatball/mozzarella pizza is excellent! The bar is a good place to watch a game..especially when it's nice out & they have the large glass doors open.

name: Allie Heiman
text: The drinks are awesome, not much else to say. The service was poor and food was mediocre at best. We ordered the pizza with sausage, meatballs, ricotta, and hot peppers. There was no sausage on the actual pizza and the peppers were not hot, no flavor at all. We will not be going back.

name: ND
text: Great food, good service, awesome people!  I'll definitely be back to this location.  Suggestion: 1) you have a number of beer taps, you should take advantage of the many great local craft beers available to showcase that can't be found in ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Glade
text: Before reading my review please keep in mind that the 1-star is for the Lombard location only. I have been to the Orland Park location many times and have had nothing but great service and food. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack Rylands III
text: I loved this place because the waitresses were awesome, the service was great, but of all the food is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! The food here is all cooked over a coal fire and it‚Äôs just really nice in here so 13/10

name: Steve Lazzar
text: Great pizza and atmosphere! Staff is nice too!!

name: 098tyiskool
text: Food is made out to be more than it is, very basic it‚Äôs okay at best. Very expensive for how simple the menu really is. Very small kitchen very crowded hard to work in. I would not recommend working here if you are claustrophobic.

name: Lisa Gray
text: We were craving good pizza after our first night back from our honeymoon and this hit the spot. Good service, good vibe, good music, and delicious pizza. I had that Malbec wine which was also very tasty. We will be coming back for the ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Calcagno
text: The only thing better than the food was the service. The wings were delicious and I highly recommend them. Will definitely be returning.

name: Cory Gibson
text: Pizzas were a little burnt. The waitress couldn‚Äôt give us a recommendation at all. Then after quite a bit of time we were told they were 86 some things. I give 3 stars only due to them being brand new, probably just need some more time training on oven and people and restocking food appropriately.

name: Tammy Lawson
text: Hope your not in a hurry for ANYTHING cause all the workers move slower than the speed of Branson. 20 min for them to even start our order. Even though we checked in to say we were there.. so un professional.  We got swore at for asking too. Not coming back

name: Shannon Brooks
text: Always great food! Come in for happy hour and get, what I think is, the perfect size pizza for $6... Delicious!

name: Michael Fitzpatrick
text: Service was fantastic.  Only complaint was wings were dry and over cooked.

name: Sitaara Stevenson
text: This is a nice location and Kendall is so friendly

name: pablo rodriguez
text: The meatballs are to die for and pizza is top notch I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone I really do look forward to going back thanks for the experience Lombard team!!!!!

name: Erica Scully
text: Loved eating here. Had Caprese salad and Anthony's salad, both were delicious. Pizza was amazing. Staff was very friendly and attentive.

name: Lou Cimino
text: Margherita pizza was 10/10 The salad was huge and came out quickly after I ordered my pizza, The service was exceptional even tho It was busy and I was by myself, The manager gave me a brief history of Anthony‚Äôs and the coal fired pizza, ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Wharram
text: First visit was great. second visit.... Not so much

name: Douglas Harlan
text: This place just opened two weeks ago and we found it driving by. We had a great experience, the service was friendly and engaging, but most importantly the pizza was excellent. We had the traditional pepperoni pie and finished every last bite of it. We will be back!

name: L Lop
text: A little on the burnt side but good.  Guy  running the oven needs more training.

name: Mr. W
text: Such good quality pizza

name: Virendra Nagar
text: Great üçï had fun with kids ..

name: Donna Abbruscato
text: Great place, wonderful pizza, this establishment is based out of Florida.

name: J Fro
text: Pizza was overcooked. Too expensive for the quality. We were told that our takeout order would take 10-15 minutes but it took more than double that. Restaurant has a nice appearance. Staff was friendly.

name: Andrea Pyburn
text: Chocolate cake was not very chocolatey. We got 3 personal pizzas and 2 were black/burnt on the bottom.

name: Rocco DiOrio
text: Food was very good. The 4 cheese pizza was excellent

name: ali mani
text: Nice new place to go with family and friends to have eats and drinks. There are enough servers so that you don't have to wait for someone to become available to attend to you.

name: Bunty Shah
text: Great thin crust and amazing service! Probably go back just for the service

name: paula olivos
text: We ordered food for pick up, the pizza was great but the cheesecake had mold on it!!! Makes me very hesitant to order anything else.

name: Devarj Datcher
text: Great food and friendly service!

name: Cody S
text: Got a small pepperoni pizza that was incredibly bland and way overpriced. The appetizer  meatballs reminded me of chef boyardee in a can. The menu listed no beers and said to ask the staff but when I asked the waitress she had no idea. ‚Ä¶More

name: mike lambermont
text: Just moved from Tampa. My favorite pizza there. Now I have one close by in Oak Brook.  Eveeything based in coal oven. Love it.

name: RICK PISCIOTTO
text: First time there pizza was great the srvice excellent

name: Janet Leone
text: walked in, a waitress said 1 minute, now remember there was hardly anyone there. 5 minutes later i think the manager asked if i was picking up, i replied i have been waiting for a table for 2 which he seated us right away. ordered a glass ‚Ä¶More

name: Todd Stevens
text: Everyone knows this is the best pizza around!

name: Joseph Castro
text: Perfect place to take your significant other out for a casual date

name: Richard Pacelli
text: Good food and service

name: Allark
text: Their wings are off the chart....their mojitos are too....lol...friendly staff....try it out

name: Ray Jablonski
text: Pizza was soggy. Not the same quality as the last time we were there.

name: mzhodge1
text: 2nd time going and we love it!

name: Ty Lay
text: Best pizza in chicago!!

name: Betty Ann Pisciotto
text: Pizza good service good

name: Rebecca Houston
text: Poor service. Really expensive.

name: Laura Syms
text: Just okay.

name: Terry Easley
text: Great pizza and wings

name: Caroline Savoi
text: Best pizza ever

name: Eric Fine
text: A solid lunch option.

name: Tamara Moore
text: Pizza was a little burnt this time.

name: Freddie Foust

name: Carrie Neville
text: Pizza and staff was amazing!!!
